items.sentence: I\'m sorry for calling so late. I just wanted to hear your voice.
I\'ve already forgotten why you said we were supposed to do this.
If you want more details about that, you\'ll have to ask my boss.
Is there anything we need to do before this afternoon\'s meeting?
I think you\'re the most beautiful woman in the whole wide world.
The reason that happened to you was because you weren\'t careful.
Tom said he wasn\'t looking forward to this afternoon\'s meeting.
I\'m sure it wouldn\'t be too hard to find another place to live.
I\'m surprised that you didn\'t know that Tom could speak French.
I\'m the only one in our class who doesn\'t want to study French.
We were expecting Tom to be at the party, but he didn\'t show up.
Before working here, Tom was a police officer for thirteen years.
Before you can love others, you need to be able to love yourself.
Can you imagine what our lives would be like without electricity?
I heard that Mary was sick all last week, but she looks well now.
It\'s a shame we weren\'t able to get to know one another better.
A person\'s way of looking at something depends on his situation.
Even though Tom is only sixteen, he looks like he\'s over twenty.
I think it wouldn\'t be too hard to come up with a better system.
Tom isn\'t the kind of person who blames others for his mistakes.
